Electric energy.
The formula for electrical energy is E = {1:SHORTANSWER:=P*T~%100%P·T~%100%T*P~%100%T·P}
Where
E = electric {1:SHORTANSWER:=energy} in {1:SHORTANSWER:=kilowatts}-hour [kWh]
P = electric {1:SHORTANSWER:=power} in kilowatts [kW]
T = {1:SHORTANSWER:=time} in hours [h]

Electric energy.
The time formula is T = {1:SHORTANSWER:=E/P}
Where
E = electric {1:SHORTANSWER:=energy} in {1:SHORTANSWER:=kilowatts}-hour [kWh]
P = electric {1:SHORTANSWER:=power} in kilowatts [kW]
T = {1:SHORTANSWER:=time} in hours [h]

Electric energy.
The formula for electrical power is P = {1:SHORTANSWER:=E/T}
Where
E = electric {1:SHORTANSWER:=energy} in {1:SHORTANSWER:=kilowatts}-hour [kWh]
P = electric {1:SHORTANSWER:=power} in kilowatts [kW]
T = {1:SHORTANSWER:=time} in hours [h]

Air heater.
What energy does a 2000 watt air heater consume per month if it runs for 4 hours per day?

E = {1:SHORTANSWER:=240} kWh

Frigorífico.
What energy does a 150-watt refrigerator consume per month if it runs 15 hours a day?

E = {1:SHORTANSWER:=67} kWh

Energy saving bulb.
What is the monthly energy consumption of a 15-watt energy-saving light bulb if it is operated for 8 hours a day?

E = {1:SHORTANSWER:=3,6} kWh

Router.
How much energy does a 20 watt router consume per year if it runs 24 hours a day?

E = {1:SHORTANSWER:=175,2} kWh

Hair dryer.
What is the monthly energy consumption of a 2000 watt hair dryer if it runs for a quarter of an hour a day?

E = {1:SHORTANSWER:=15} kWh

Microwave oven.
How much energy does an 800-watt microwave oven consume per month if it runs for half an hour a day?

E = {1:SHORTANSWER:=12} kWh

Gaming PC.
How much energy does a 300 watt gaming computer consume per month if it runs four hours a day?

E = {1:SHORTANSWER:=36} kWh

Videogame console.
What is the monthly energy consumption of a 200 watt game console if it runs 3 hours a day?

E = {1:SHORTANSWER:=18} kWh

Battery-operated flashlight.
What power does a flashlight have knowing that its battery stores 5 watt-hours of electrical energy and that it lasts for 10 hours in operation?

P = {1:SHORTANSWER:=0,5} W

Electric heating.
What is the power of an electric heater knowing that has consumed 360 kWh in a month turning it on 8 hours a day?

P = {1:SHORTANSWER:=1500} W

Appliances in standby mode.
A house is closed for a month with the appliances in standby mode. appliances in standby mode. The electricity bill for that month shows a total consumption of 43.2 kWh.
What is the power consumption of all appliances on standby?

P = {1:SHORTANSWER:=60} W
